english_example_sentence: When I don't allow it, I worry.
russian_example_sentence: Когда я этого не позволяю, я беспокоюсь.
turkish_example_sentence: Ben kendime tatlı yemeye izin vermediğimde, biraz mutsuz oluyorum.
